root.name: Canada Hunt
root.description: OverviewCanada Hunt equips players with different guns, gear and ammunition and tasks them with venturing into the wilds of Canada to kill deer, elk, spring gobblers and other such animals. While hunting animals players can use the "critter cam" to get a view of the game from the perspective of the animal they are hunting and players also earn trophies as they advance through the game. The game also features special training, an arcade mode and bonus modes.
